course_title: Special Topics: Film and Media: Post Production
class_notes: This course has an additional Prerequisite of FILM 107. Please contact Clare Sterling (ecsterl@emory.edu) for a permission number if eligible.
course_description: Rotating topics in film and media. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
